channel.title: Posts on BLVCKƔXLGV

item.title: What Big Eyes You Have
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description:
So a popular jQuery upload plugin used .htaccess for security control but the default behaviour in Apache was changed 8 years ago (v2.3.9) so attackers have been able to upload payloads using the plugin.

Luckily it’s only the second biggest jQuery repo on GitHub (and has only been forked 7,834 times!)

item.title: Unboxing VirtualBox
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description:
Talk by Niklas Baumstark from Insomni’hack 2018

Many of these bugs have probably been around since 2001.

item.title: wsl
item.author: blackvolga@pm.me (GAZ23)
item.description: Sometimes we all get stuck on a windows machine. Luckily, since the March 2018 Update, Windows Subsystem for Linux has grown into a surprisingly superior alternative to the likes of cygwin for your basic terminal needs.
